DOC.brief_summary: The study compare Laryngeal Tube Suction ( LTS-D ) Disposable Supreme Laryngeal Mask Airway ( SLMA ) spontaneous ventilation . The investigator hypothesize LTS-D SLMA perform similarly spontaneous ventilation despite difference structural design .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Supreme Laryngeal Mask Airway Laryngeal Tube Suction During Spontaneous Ventilation
DOC.detailed_description: The Supreme Laryngeal Mask Airway ( SLMA ) , ( Intavent Orthofix , Maidenhead , UK ) , Laryngeal Tube Suction -Disposable ( LTS-D , ( VBM Medizintechnik GmbH , Sulz , Germany ) , second generation single-use supraglottic airway device ( SADs ) gastric access , airway management spontaneously mechanically ventilated patient undergo general anesthesia . The SLMA compare Proseal Laryngeal Mask Airway ( PLMA ) mechanical spontaneous ventilation LTS II ( multiple use version LTS-D ) PLMA . Recently , LTS-D SLMA compare used pressure control mechanical ventilation . To date , publish data compare SLMA LTS-D spontaneous ventilation . The investigator hypothesize SLMA LTS-D perform similarly spontaneous ventilation despite difference structural design . The chief aim prospective randomize study compare SLMA LTS-D respect 1 ) Oxygen saturation End Tidal carbone dioxide spontaneous ventilation , 2 ) time achieve effective airway , 3 ) ease insertion , 4 ) need intervention achieve effective airway , 5 ) cuff seal ( leak ) pressure intracuff pressure 60 cm H2O , 6 ) ventilatory variable spontaneous ventilation , 7 ) fiberoptic score , 8 ) adverse perioperative event .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients , American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status I II , normal airway minor elective surgery . Age < 18 year , Weight < 50 kg , Cervical spine disease limit neck know difficult airway , Patients active gastroesophageal reflux .
